channel.title: America's Debate Radio with Mike and Jaime
channel.description: America's Debate Radio hosted by Mike and Jaime is your online political call-in talk show. Topics range from today's top news stories with a focus on politics, to offbeat and funny news. AD Radio airs live for three hours every Wednesday at 9:00PM Eastern. Unscreened open lines! Call 888.DEBATE.5 to be part of the show. Please see our website at radio.americasdebate.net for further details!

item.title: America's Debate Radio #310
item.itunes:author: America's Debate
item.itunes:subtitle: America's Debate Radio - Aired Live on May 9, 2012
item.itunes:summary: The 310th edition of America's Debate Radio with Mike and Jaime. During the first hour, we discussed gay marriage, political pandering, updates on the 2012 election campaigns, and the allegedly foiled suicide bomber in Yemen. During the second hour, we discussed student loans, postal reform, and the ineptness of our current Senate. We welcome your feedback! Have your email read on the air-- visit our website to use the email form. Or, call 888.DEBATE.5 now and leave a message-- we'll play it on the next show. Thanks for listening!

item.title: America's Debate Radio #309
item.itunes:author: America's Debate
item.itunes:subtitle: America's Debate Radio - Aired Live on May 2, 2012
item.itunes:summary: The 309th edition of America's Debate Radio with Mike and Jaime. During the first hour, we discussed student and May Day protests, President Obama's trip to Afghanistan combined with the start of his reelection campaign. During the second hour, we spoke with 3 callers and discussed technology patent lawsuits, the Secret Service prostitute scandal, US foreign relations spending, and an Afghanistan exit strategy. We welcome your feedback! Have your email read on the air-- visit our website to use the email form. Or, call 888.DEBATE.5 now and leave a message-- we'll play it on the next show. Thanks for listening!

item.itunes:subtitle: America's Debate Radio - Aired Live on April 4, 2012
item.itunes:summary: The 305th edition of America's Debate Radio with Mike and Jaime. During the first hour, we discussed monarchies, the 2012 presidential election, and President Obama's comments on the healthcare law cases pending before the Supreme Court. During the second hour, we spoke with 2 callers and discussed the NDAA and the parties seeking an injunction against it, and the recent tensions between the Executive and Judicial branches. During the final hour, we discussed odd and unusual news. Submit your own stories at AllegedlyNews.com. We welcome your feedback! item.itunes:subtitle: America's Debate Radio - Aired Live on January 24, 2012
item.itunes:summary: The 297th edition of America's Debate Radio with Mike and Jaime. This is a special edition of America's Debate Radio. Tonight, the President gave his third State of the Union Address. After the speech, we hosted a live show and took calls all evening. We also discussed the 2012 elections and related campaigns. We welcome your feedback! Have your email read on the air-- visit our website to use the email form.
